verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> as touching <S%G4012><s%> things offered <S%G1494><s%> to idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that we all <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge. <S%G1108><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> puffs <S%G5448><s%> up, but charity <S%G26><s%> edifies. <S%G3618><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man think <S%G1380><s%> that he knows <S%G1492><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing, he knows <S%G1097><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> as he ought <S%G1163><s%> to know. <S%G1097><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> of him.

As concerning <S%G4012><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the eating <S%G1035><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> things that are offered <S%G1494><s%> in sacrifice <S%G1494><s%> to idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that an idol <S%G1497><s%> is nothing <S%G3762><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and that there is none <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> but one. <S%G1520><s%>

For though <S%G1512><s%> there be that are called <S%G3004><s%> gods, <S%G2316><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> in earth, <S%G1093><s%> (as there be gods <S%G2316><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> and lords <S%G2962><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%>)

But to us there is but one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, and we in him; and one <S%G1520><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, and we by him.

However, <S%G235><s%> there is not in every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G3956><s%> that knowledge: <S%G1108><s%> for some <S%G5100><s%> with conscience <S%G4893><s%> of the idol <S%G1497><s%> to this <S%G737><s%> hour <S%G737><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> it as a thing offered <S%G1494><s%> to an idol; <S%G1494><s%> and their conscience <S%G4893><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> is defiled. <S%G3435><s%>

But meat <S%G1033><s%> commends <S%G3936><s%> us not to God: <S%G2316><s%> for neither, <S%G3777><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we eat, <S%G5315><s%> are we the better; <S%G4052><s%> neither, <S%G3777><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we eat <S%G5315><s%> not, are we the worse. <S%G5302><s%>

But take heed <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> by any <S%G3381><s%> means <S%G4458><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> liberty <S%G1849><s%> of your's <S%G5216><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a stumbling block <S%G4348><s%> to them that are weak. <S%G770><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man see <S%G1492><s%> you which <S%G3588><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> sit <S%G2621><s%> at <S%G2621><s%> meat in the idol's <S%G1493><s%> temple, shall not the conscience <S%G4893><s%> of him which is weak <S%G772><s%> be emboldened <S%G3618><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are offered <S%G1494><s%> to idols; <S%G1494><s%>
And through <S%G1909><s%> your knowledge <S%G1108><s%> shall the weak <S%G770><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> perish, <S%G622><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died? <S%G599><s%>

But when you sin <S%G264><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> and wound <S%G5180><s%> their weak <S%G770><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> you sin <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Why, <S%G1355><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%> make <S%G4624><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> to offend, <S%G4624><s%> I will eat <S%G5315><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> flesh <S%G2907><s%> while the world <S%G165><s%> stands, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I make <S%G4624><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> to offend. <S%G4624><s%>
